author: Rosie
name: AdWarn
install_msg:
Thank you for installing this cog!
Do `[p]help CogName` to get the list of commands and their description. This cog can only be ran by you, the bot owner. If you want to help translate, go to my [crowdin](<https://crowdin.com/project/Star-Cogs>).
Make sure you set the proper channel up for adwarns to be posted in, optionally setup the automated voice channel that displays the most recently adwarned user.
short: Adwarn users for their ads they sent
description: Allows adwarning of advertisements users send in advertisement servers to allow better `open-moderation` and keep the rules in check too
